english.segment1: YOU!. It's so loud and it's crowding my eyes. and now I can't look away. And right now nothing else is real, just keep your eyes on me, it won't. be long until
english.segment2: It's you and me, (it's you). It's you and me. I wanna tell you. everything, I wanna tell you everything. 'cause I am so in love with you, I wanna fall in love with you. There's no where else I'd rather be, there's no one here but you and me.
english.segment3: We've come so far. the sun is fading, now I am all of your with you. This is where I wanna stay, this is the only thing that's real. nothing will pull me away. I won't let go until
english.segment4: It's you and me, (it's you). It's you and me. I wanna tell you. everything, I wanna tell you everything. 'cause I am so in love with you, I wanna fall in love with you. There's no where else I'd rather be, there's no one here but you and me. (x2)
